resources.string: Visit the developer\'s blog at https://www.linangran.com.
Why this app can\'t be free?

Youku Listener allows you to listen to millions of videos that are available on Youku.com. Audio files are provided in a single file for you to download or stream.\nSign in with your Google Account to have your first month free, while subsequent access is only $0.99/month.
Hello %s, it is good to have you here. You current subscription ends on %s."
Your account on Youku Listener will be DELETED FOREVER! This is not a revocable action and you WILL NOT get a refund for your remaining subscription!
Your Youku Listener account has been revoked.
